TI_DOC.P: EIB - Improvement of regional airports, Tanzania (TZ-Dar es Salaam)

CONTENTS.P: Project title and number: Tanzania Improvement to Regional Airports – Serapis No.2010-0324
Tender number and name: AE-027/2015-2016/HQ/C/37 For Consultancy Services for Supervision of rehabilitation and upgrading of Kigoma and Tabora Airports.
Publication date of the procurement notice: 21.5.2016
Promoter’s name: Tanzania Airports Authority
Contract value:1 599 034.30 USD
Date of award of contract: 29.5.2017
Number of bids received: 4

Name and address of successful bidder: Khatib & Alami Consulting Engineers (off shore) S.A.L of P.O.Box 14-6203, Beiruti 1105 2100, Al Akhtal Assaghir Street-Jnal, Beiruti – Lebanon, Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.
